```{r}
library(simulatetimeseries)
```


```{r, fig.width = 7.5}
# 1. Unimodal data
unimodal_data <- matrix(rnorm(1000, mean = 2, sd = 4))
synthetic1 <- rgan(unimodal_data, n = 500, p = 1, type_input = "unimodal")
ks.test(unimodal_data, synthetic1)

# 2. Mixture data  
mixture <- rbinom(1000, 1, 0.5)
mixture_data <- matrix(mixture * rnorm(1000, 2, 1) + (1-mixture) * rnorm(1000, 8, 2))
synthetic2 <- rgan(mixture_data, n = 500, p = 1, type_input = "mixture")
ks.test(unimodal_data, synthetic2)

# 3. Financial data
unimodal_data <- diff(log(EuStockMarkets[1:500, 1]))
synthetic3 <- rgan(unimodal_data, n = 500, p = 1, type_input = "financial")
ks.test(unimodal_data, synthetic3)

# 4. Automatic detection
(synthetic_auto <- rgan_auto(unimodal_data, n = 500, p = 1))
```
